dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 292 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 24355 Creekside Road in Santa Clarita, California, as the “William L. Reynolds Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 24355 Creekside Road in Santa Clarita, California, as the William L. Reynolds Post Office Building.

section.header: William L. Reynolds Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 24355 Creekside Road in Santa Clarita, California, shall be known and designated as the William L. Reynolds Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the William L. Reynolds Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 2, 2023.
